metadata.title: CVE-2024-10004 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Opening an external link to an HTTP website when Firefox iOS was previouslyclosed and had an HTTPS tab open could in some cases result in the padlockicon showing an HTTPS indicator incorrectly This vulnerability affectsFirefox for iOS < 131.2.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
